page.title: 13Homelife - Part 2
page.content: Radio, television, record players, tape recorders & videos, are the main home entertainment. The new compact disc record player is becoming very popular. Reading is also popular, a mobile library tours the district once a week. Gardens are well tended. Many grow organic vegetables. Full use is made of a wide variety of power tools, ie lawnmowers, hedgecutters, weed strimmers etc. Many undertake own home maintenance and decorating. Telephone is high on the list of requirements. Most homes have family pets, ie cats, dogs, guinea pigs, rabbits, ponies and goats & goats.
